name: Flip-Flopping on Hot Lava
description:
Submission to the Trijam #149 (Theme: "Flipped").

Walk around and try to avoid the hot lava for it is not suggested to walk on lava with plastic flip-flops.

Controls:

  • Use the left mouse button (or W or the UP-Arrow) to walk in the direction of the mouse. 
  • Use the right mouse button (or SPACE) to jump.
  • Collect as many coins as you can.

Credits to Matthew Klingensmith (www.matthewklingensmith.com) for the soundtrack (https://opengameart.org/content/matts-creative-commons-music)
